description:
This course will not only show you how to build a Youtube channel, but the keys and strategies to keeping your Youtube channel successful.

Millions of people are making money off of their Youtube channels, so why not you?

We take you through building our own successful Youtube channel and show you the tricks that we used to gain over 500 subscribers and almost 100,000 views in little over two months. This course is very unique in that it won't just show you how to build Youtube Channels, but it gives you a REAL-LIFE example of a successful Youtube channel. Also, this channel is not targeted in the marketing niche. It's in a completely different niche that we found that can help you to see where you should be working to exploit your own interests.

The course can take as little as an hour to go through. Each video is about 3-5 minutes long with helpful details that you'll be able to easily understand.

To get started, all you'll need is a Youtube login, a way to take videos (ie. smartphone, camera, etc) and that's it! It's as simple as that to get started.

Why should you take this course?

Because we won't only show you how to build your channel, but give you a real-life example of a Youtube Channel that you can visit and follow on a daily basis.

How is this course different from others?

I promise not to put you to sleep!! There are a million videos out there that make you feel like you're in a boring lecture hall and the speaker is monotone and boring. Not me! Watch our preview video to see that you'll actually see my face the entire time and you'll find a little humor throughout the video to keep learning fun and interesting.

I'm consistently adding new lectures to this course. Lectures I'll be adding this week are:

  • Copyright Restrictions - How to Tell If Your Content is Violating Copyright Laws
  • Strikes - What they are, how you get them and how to avoid them
  • Where to NOT buy traffic from
  • Where to buy traffic from
title: Build Your Youtube Channel to 500 Subscribers in Two Months
